Transformer.error: Something went wrong trying to get the Cart Transformer's data.
Transformer.id_value: Show values for Cart Transformer with ID:

explanation.line1: You need to write a string that follows this format: name,value;name,value;name,value...
explanation.line2: Meaning, the name of the tax, separated by "," with its value. If you wish to add different values for the tax, you will need to separate them with ";", only one of these will be applied at once.
explanation.line3: For example, this tax has 3 values, "normal", "reducido" y "superreducido", which would be written: "normal,0.1;reducido,0.1;superreducido,0.1"
